Civilian6.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian6 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is named Ch’kk’chk.
Civilian6.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian6 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Civilian7.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian7 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is a chlild named Zerillo.
Civilian7.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian7 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Wizard3.how_to_trigger: talk to the wizard3 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Wizard2.how_to_trigger: Talk to the wizard2 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Civilian1.synopsis: One-liner for Ermlaut, Civilian1 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette.
Civilian1.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian1 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Wizard1.synopsis: One-liner for the Wizard1 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This wizard is named Astoundo the Greater.
Wizard1.how_to_trigger: talk to the wizard1 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Civilian2.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian2 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is named Ooltheg.
Civilian2.how_to_trigger: talk to the civilian2 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Civilian3.synopsis: Eastway Wizards: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is named Drarra.

Civilian4.synopsis: One-liner for Ma Festina, Civilian4 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette.
Civilian4.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian4 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

AD_ChildrensSpeech.synopsis: Close by the sorcerous sundries, a group of wizard student are using their magic to amaze and amuse.  Kids of all stripes share their excitement with their parents. NAMES, PLEASE, SCRIPTER: character 1: Patrunu. 2: Trinkle. 3: Margu. 4: ‘Anklebiter’. 5: Bordo.
AD_ChildrensSpeech.how_to_trigger: Get near the Sorcerous Sundries fountain, get close enough to the group over there.

Civilian5.synopsis: One-liner for the Civilian5 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette: a trio of young mages do a Gandalf and put on a light and sound show for passersby on the plaza in front of Sorcerous Sundries. This civilian is named Duddy Dudderken.
Civilian5.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian5 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

Civilian6_0.speaker: Ch'kk'ch
Civilian6_0.text: Cool. Seriously cool. My favourite fireworks colour is, like, dark violet, because it's the most cool.

Civilian7_0.speaker: Zerillo
Civilian7_0.text: Yay! When I'm older I'm going to become a wizard and zap all the goblins and ogres!

Civilian7_1.speaker: Zerillo
Civilian7_1.text: You! You're a creep. I'm going to become a wizard like those three and fry creeps like you with fireballs!

Civilian7_2.speaker: Zerillo
Civilian7_2.text: I'm going to grow up to be a great wizard and wade through my enemies with spells of fire and blood! Mostly fire.

Wizard3_0.speaker: Astoundo the Lesser
Wizard3_0.text: Yeah! I mean, yea, verily, behold and stuff! Just like Astoundo the Greater says!

Wizard2_0.speaker: Salamander
Wizard2_0.text: Ha ha! Great, isn't it? These are just cantrips - I can keep this up all day.

Civilian1_0.speaker: Ermlaut
Civilian1_0.text: I guess there are other uses for magic besides fighting off invading cultists. But I wonder if these mages shouldn't be in the battle.

Civilian1_1.speaker: Ermlaut
Civilian1_1.text: You. There are children here - and from what I've read, I don't think you should be around them.

Civilian1_2.speaker: Ermlaut
Civilian1_2.text: Used to be like this all the time - before the Absolute. From what I hear, thanks to people like you, maybe we'll get back to that.

Wizard1_0.speaker: Astoundo the Greater
Wizard1_0.text: Behold! The sacred illuminations of the mysterious ancients!

Wizard1_1.speaker: Astoundo the Greater
Wizard1_1.text: Back off, chump, you're too close. Do you want to lose your eyebrows?

Civilian2_0.speaker: Ooltheg
Civilian2_0.text: Beautiful! What colours. Reminds me of the sparkler tricks on Liar's Night!

Civilian3_0.speaker: Drarra
Civilian3_0.text: Sweet - a magic show! It's been ages since there was any fun in this city.

Civilian4_0.speaker: Ma Festina
Civilian4_0.text: Just look at her, ha ha! She hasn't been this excited since her birthday!

Civilian4_1.speaker: Ma Festina
Civilian4_1.text: I've heard you're trouble. The kids here are enjoying themselves, so why don't you just... move along?

Civilian4_2.speaker: Ma Festina
Civilian4_2.text: Well! Fireworks for the kids, and then a local hero walks up! Quite a day.

AD_ChildrensSpeech_0.speaker: Zerillo
AD_ChildrensSpeech_0.text: Look, Mama, look! It's so, so pretty!

AD_ChildrensSpeech_1.speaker: Ma Festina
AD_ChildrensSpeech_1.text: I see it sweetie! Stand up, you're slouching.

AD_ChildrensSpeech_3.speaker: Duddy Dudderken
AD_ChildrensSpeech_3.text: Bigger bigger bigger! Make it bigger!

AD_ChildrensSpeech_2.speaker: Ermlaut
AD_ChildrensSpeech_2.text: Calm down, 'Biter, you're louder than the fireworks!

AD_ChildrensSpeech_4.speaker: Salamander
AD_ChildrensSpeech_4.text: Gather 'round for the show! Sit down if you're in front.

Civilian5_2.speaker: Duddy Dudderken
Civilian5_2.text: Woo-hoo! Great shit, wizzos! Keep it up!
